name: Big Bar Blitz
description:
Better be quick on your feet and quicker with your liquor. Dash from one guest to another, getting them their drinks in a timely manner. The faster you serve, the faster they tip. But take too long, and they'll march right out in an angry fit. Three strikes and you're fired!

Get through three days of work, each one more hectic than the last. Or take on Party Mode, where the drinks keep coming and the night never ends.

Get your mixer ready, it's time to put on a show!
